slide_problem.title: Current Problem

problem_1.title: Complexity
problem_1.text: Designing living spaces involves immense complexity, demanding both deep understanding and significant financial investment.

problem_2.title: Costs
problem_2.text: High costs deter many from considering serious remodeling or redesign of their living spaces.

problem_3.title: Lack of User-Friendly Tools
problem_3.text: The interior design market lacks user-friendly tools, hindering accessibility for homeowners.

slide_problem.summary: Interior design challenges encompass complexity, costs, and a scarcity of user-friendly tools.
